insert into demo.vul_map_asset(ASSET_ID, VUL_MAP_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, TENANT_ID) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.assetId}, #{entity.vulMapId}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.tenantId})

insert into demo.vul_map_asset(ASSET_ID, VUL_MAP_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, TENANT_ID) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.assetId}, #{entity.vulMapId}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.tenantId})
on duplicate key update ASSET_ID = values(ASSET_ID) , VUL_MAP_ID = values(VUL_MAP_ID) , CREATE_DATE = values(CREATE_DATE) , UPDATE_DATE = values(UPDATE_DATE) , DEL_FLAG = values(DEL_FLAG) , TENANT_ID = values(TENANT_ID)
